text: Kananjalo akuyi kuba sisono kuni ukwenza uncwaso lokutshata okanye nilufihle ngaphakathi kuni, uAllâh Uyazi okokuba niya kubaqaphela (abo bafazi) kodwa ningenzi isithembiso sesivumelwano nabo emfihlakalweni ngaphandle kokuba nitsho amazwi anentlonipheko ngokoMthetho weIslam74. Ningadibani ngesondo lingekapheli ixesha elibekiweyo lokuzila. Yazini kananjalo okokuba uAllâh Uyakwazi okusezingqondweni zenu, Moyikeni ke ngoko. Nazi kananjalo okokuba uAllâh nguMxoleli, uSozinceba
